author: Slidebean
description: America’s air traffic control system still relies on Windows 95 and floppy disks. Meanwhile, Europe’s landing planes with VR and AI. The FAA says 76% of U.S. systems are outdated; but the funding rules keeping them that way are even worse.
title: U.S. Air Traffic Still Runs on Floppy Disks

author: Slidebean
description: Zora is now the #1 app on the App Store. It scans your face and records your voice in seconds, supposedly to “personalize” AI; but in an election year, that’s a deepfake dream and a misinformation nightmare.
title: Sora App Tops Charts
